summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of West Lynn Street from 29th Avenue West to 30th Avenue West; by grading and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 8866 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
